text: i've had a varied career
i've worked as an it consultant a
product manager and i founded
two tech startups of my own i've even
had a spell as a manager of my family's
manufacturing business
there were two things that brought me to
aws firstly i wanted to move to a
business on a strong
upward growth trajectory but i didn't
want to join another startup
at aws you get the best of both worlds a
real startup culture
within a huge organization secondly
though more remote worker
i'm manchester based and manchester born
and bred when i heard about the plans
for a new office i was really excited
about it
and the reality turned out better than i
ever expected
today i'm a solutions architect manager
here at aws
that means that i look after a team of
solutions architects
who are the technical leaders from an
aws perspective
at our largest public sector customers
in the uk
every time we help our public sector
customers to do things more simply and
save money with their i.t
we release more resources that they can
invest into innovation
to better fit the lives of citizens at
aws i have the possibility of helping
our biggest customers leverage
technology
in a way that can really make a positive
difference in millions of people's lives
not many people can say that
